item.description:
This is an annual event that takes place rain or shine at Harpoon Brewery celebrating the best of Summer - Fresh Beer and Live Music.

Doors open at 5:30pm on Friday, June4

Doors close at 9:30pm

Event ends at 11:00pm

A wide selection of different styles of fresh beer from Harpoon available for purchase

Food sold by a variety of vendors

Featuring popular Boston up-and-coming bands including The Seamonsters and Bad Rabbits on 2 stages

Must be 21 and older with proper ID

Cover charge is $20.00 and includes a souvineer Pint Cup and 1 drink ticket

Cash bar for $5.00 per pint

Free shuttle buses from South Station behind the Federal Reserve on Summer Street

Public Parking available at Garage across the street from Brewery

Take the T Silver Line to Harbor Street stop

Designated driver program available at the event

FRIEND OF HARPOON SPECIAL Friday night $10.00 admission with your FOH card includes 1 pint

No advance ticket sales.

For more info call 1-888-HAR-POON ext 3 or


More details are available on the Harpoon Brewery web site. Please check for additional updates.
item.how_to_find_us: Arrive Aprox 6:00PM & Enter/ Later Arrivals Go to Security Podium at 6 and 7pm to meet inside
item.name: Harpoon Summer Session Party at Harpoon Brewery
